message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you buy it, you'll get a great deal, but if you don't, I'll just have to sell it to someone else who will probably pay the same price. What do you say?
I'm not sure if this is a good deal for me, I'll pass for now.

I understand you're hesitant, but I want to make it clear that this product is not as good as the one I showed you last round. It's a bit of a compromise, but I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $100. If you're willing to take a chance, you might be able to flip it for a profit later or use it for a different purpose. What do you think?
I'm not convinced that this product is a good value for me, I'll pass.

I understand you're still hesitant, but I want to be upfront with you - this product is not a great value, and I'm willing to let it go for $90. It's a significant discount from the usual price, and I'm only offering it to you because I think it's worth something to someone. If you're not interested, I'll just have to sell it to someone else for a lower price.
I'll take a chance on this one, but only because of the discount. I'm hoping it's a high-quality product.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! Unfortunately, this one is not as good. I'm willing to sell it to you for $80, and I'll even throw in a small bonus - I'll give you a 10% refund if you return it to me within a week. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a fair deal considering the product's value.
I don't think the refund offer changes the fact that I'm not interested in a low-quality product. I'll pass.

I'll take you up on your guarantee, and I'll buy the product. But I'm only doing it because of the guarantee, not because I think it's a good value at $100.

It's a straightforward deal, and I think you'll be happy with it.

I don't think the 'get out of one bad deal free' card changes the fact that this product is low-quality. I'll pass.

If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and I'm not sure they'll be as understanding as you've been. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a fair deal considering the circumstances.
